description: Complete system overview focusing on the three-tier architecture (Frontend, Backend, Telegram Bot) and their interactions, with emphasis on the e-commerce workflow
Comprehensive documentation of data models including Order, Store, Product, User, and their relationships, with special focus on the variant system and multi-store architecture
Detailed documentation of the order processing algorithm, including the custom order number generation, multi-step verification workflow, and inventory management integration
Documentation of the hierarchical role-based access control system, store-specific admin privileges, and cross-store authorization mechanisms
Technical documentation of the Telegram bot integration, focusing on session management, cart handling, and the custom order flow implementation
